vsParam:
Next, add the final ingredient...
Great, [px]! The synthesis is done!

Hmm. You are making progress again.
I must work hard in my cultivation, I can't lose to you—— Ah.

You guys are here.
And synthesizing... Perfect timing.

I am here to ask you to prepare
some items for me with alchemy.

Sterk's asking for help from us?
It's pretty rare, huh? What's wrong?
Hmm. Recent report has it that strange monsters are spotted on the mountainous area of Olbius.
Uh hmm!? T, that would be... a big problem!

Cresson must have heard of it, and the Guard has decided
to investigate the mountain in a few days.

I will go with them...
But we don't have sufficient materials for the investigation.

If this situation of shortage continues,
our investigation will be negatively affected.

So, I have made a list of the things we'll need.
Can you guys help us prepare these items?

Sure! Let's make them with our hearts, 
[px]!

Sterk!
The items you asked are done!
Hmm, you're a big help. Thank you very much.

Oh... This item is very nicely fabricated, with such
high-quality items, our investigation can be guaranteed.

But who knows what kind of monsters will we face...
So, please don't go close to the mountainous area.
Let us assist with the investigation!
You be careful, too, Sterk. Don't risk!

No, you have helped me a lot.
The rest is our job.

But Sterk, is it really alright?
You look scary.

Ah! Uh, hmm,
I didn't mean anything bad!

That's okay... It's just, I haven't done a knight's duty for
quite a while, I guess I can't help being excited.

Similarly, you guys are still students,
no matter how powerful you are, your duty is study.

To make you focus more on your studies,
we are obligated to eliminate the risks around you...

Only by undertaking such dangerous quests
can I feel my value of existence as a knight.

I understand... Although I firmly believe in
your strength, please don't risk!
Sure. I'll keep it in mind.

If I were born in this world,
I wouldn't be troubled by how to be a good knight...
